ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def OnCMD_EXCLUIRINCLUIRPARCELASExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode # recupera a lista que representa o breadcrumb breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_ADITIVORETENCAO")) command.TransitoryVars["TransitoryAditivoRetencao"] = item.Handle command.TransitoryVars["EhInclusao"] = True command.TransitoryVars["EhExclusao"] = False
